entry.tran: （对观点、指责或理论的）驳斥，反驳
entry.def: A refutation of an argument, accusation, or theory is something that proves it is wrong or untrue.

example.ex: He prepared a complete refutation of the Republicans' most serious charges.
example.tran: 他准备全面反驳共和党人对他最严重的指控。

means.word_mean: 1. the speech act of answering an attack on your assertions;

sentences.sentence: "his refutation of the charges was short and persuasive"
"in defense he said the other man started it"

means.word_mean: 2. any evidence that helps to establish the falsity of something
3. the act of determining that something is false
